title: Crème Sautéed Chanterelle Recipe
directions: In a sauté pan, heat butter and make sure it’s hot. Add mushrooms and cook for 2 minutes, then add garlic, shallots, thyme, El Gaucho Seasoning, and cook for 1-2 minutes. Stir in Madeira wine and veal demi-glace, and cook for 2 minutes. Finish by adding cream and whole butter. Garnish with truffle oil and parsley. Bon Appétit!
*El Gaucho Seasoning can be purchased locally at Metropolitan Market, Zupans, in any El Gaucho or AQUA by El Gaucho restaurant, and online at Amazon.com.
